text:
White House Conference on Highway Safety
General Services Buildin^
Washington 25, D. C.
TO THE EDITOR:
Because of the great interest shown in the White
House Conference on Highway Safety by the public infor¬
mation media, I’m attaching a preliminary summary of all
Conference reports. Perhaps this material may suggest
ideas for local angle stories or editorials. Thanks
very much for your pre-Conference coverage.
Sincerely yours
Min Miller
Rear Admiral, USN (Ret.)
Conference Director
Attachments
